meanings.definition: The state of being weary or fatigued.
meanings.sent1: After a long day of playing outside, the child's tiredness was evident in his droopy eyes.
meanings.sent2: She struggled to keep her eyes open due to the overwhelming tiredness she felt.
meanings.sent3: The tiredness in the old dog's movements made him look like a slow-motion movie.
meanings.sent4: The tiredness of the engine was evident as it sputtered and coughed to a stop.
meanings.sent5: The tiredness of the marathon runner was palpable as he crossed the finish line, barely able to stand.

meanings.definition: The feeling of being exhausted or lacking energy.
meanings.sent1: His tiredness after staying up all night studying for the exam was overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: The tiredness she experienced after a long day at work made her crave a nap.
meanings.sent3: The tiredness in her voice was unmistakable as she yawned for the tenth time during the meeting.
meanings.sent4: The tiredness of the phone battery was evident as it quickly drained within a few hours.
meanings.sent5: The tiredness of the old building was apparent in its creaking floors and peeling paint.
